subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: Returning to his youthful passion for sailing, Niklas Zennstrom, the co-founder of Skype, will be at the helm of his yacht, Ran, for the Sydney-Hobart race starting Sunday.
snippet: Returning to his youthful passion for sailing, Niklas Zennstrom, the co-founder of Skype, will be at the helm of his yacht, Ran, for the Sydney-Hobart race starting Sunday.
